casebody.data:
PARK EAST SALES, LLC
v.
CLARK-LANGLEY, INC.; Delia Clark Edwards; Carmel Contractors, Inc.; Lowe's Home Centers, Inc.; and Western Surety Company. No. 562P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. William J. Wolf, Durham, for Park East Sales, LLC. Steele B. Windle, III, Daniel R. Hansen, Charlotte, for Carmel, Lowe's & Western Surety. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 651 S.E.2d 235 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 3rd day of December 2007 by Defendants (Carmel, Lowe's & Western Surety) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th day of April 2008."
